author: pamarcelot
msg: Fix for DIRSTUDIO-245 (Apache DS Configuration Plugin cannot parse server.xml file correctly).
The Spring Framework Beans DTD has been added to the plugin and is used when parsing the file. This way, Dom4J will not try to load the DTD for the Internet anymore.
